column5: I would like to join! ‚ù§Ô∏è

He sounds A LOT like my abusive ex. Especially the it‚Äôs always someone else‚Äôs fault, especially woman he was with at some point. And you made me think about it but nope, he never talked about women unless it was how they looked, something sexual or to talk shit. Glad you got out the relationship now time to drop all contact. Wish you the best ‚ù§Ô∏è

Took me three years to leave my abusive ex boyfriend and I feel the same, freedom. It‚Äôs a great feeling, especially when for so long leaving them seems like the worst thing but in the end it is the BEST. 
Happy for you, sending the best wishes ‚ù§Ô∏è
We will find love again. :)
Quicker the better. You got this!
Social workers saw, not police or medical professionals but yeah I get your point

A drunk parent has tried to pick a student up from my classroom, I wouldn‚Äôt let her go and kept her. So I‚Äôm sure if I explained my reasoning and they actually investigated and saw the bruises it wouldn‚Äôt be a problem.

I got into that same head space and some days are still hard but I‚Äôve been out 1 and a half months and every day gets brighter. Get out. It‚Äôll get easier with time, I hope like me you‚Äôll just feel grateful you‚Äôre alive and that you were strong enough to leave. You got this.

You didn‚Äôt allow yourself to get stuck in this situation. 
  
Also remember looks can be deceiving. He used to tell me his ex before me was awful and all this stuff (now he says same bout me and now I know first hand it was prob him not her) but for her, I was the one posting great pics looking like he changed and everything was good, but he hadn‚Äôt, and it wasn‚Äôt. Maybe for a sec but unless a narcissist or someone with bpd like I think my ex has gets help they will never change. 

Even if he has changed it doesn‚Äôt change what he did to you. That‚Äôs what it came down to for me. He was doing same old shit but saying ‚ÄúI‚Äôm trying, I‚Äôm gonna change, I‚Äôm getting help‚Äù. I gave this time and nothing changed for longer than 2 weeks. But even when I stayed I felt awful like I just knew it would all be bad again soon and even if it wasn‚Äôt I couldn‚Äôt pretend what he did to me didn‚Äôt happen. 

Even if he is good to her now, he wasn‚Äôt to you and that‚Äôs not your fault. I promise, from experience I know you‚Äôre better off.

Seriously 
I‚Äôm kidnapping the child and calling from my house if I have to. I understand ‚Äúfollowing protocol‚Äù but what about following your morals, your heart, your brain for god sake, she and all the others just failed miserably so many different ways his life could‚Äôve been saved.
I just don‚Äôt understand how medical professionals, police officers, firefighters all say they‚Äôve never seen a child in that condition but this child went to school that way!
Yeah, I stopped at episode 3. Don‚Äôt think I can finish. She says she feels regret but it didn‚Äôt really seem like it.

True! 
There were just so many other options than she made it seem like

The protocol they teach us is really exactly what she did, you call and report. Honestly, it kinda stops there, they don‚Äôt say much on what to do if the social worker doesn‚Äôt do anything. 

She called this woman what 4 times? 
After she did nothing the first time, excuse my French but fuck protocol. Calling 911 and he‚Äôs not leaving my classroom.
EXACTLY

I work at a private school so it‚Äôs slightly different. The owner of the school is in the office almost everyday and I know for a fact she would agree with me to not let that child go home and she‚Äôd handle whatever consequences. I have about 3 other people over me that are below her and I know they‚Äôd feel the same way as well. We always talk about how we are advocates for every student and I‚Äôm lucky I‚Äôm at a place where I can see all the teachers are on the same page. 

There‚Äôs just no way a child would say what Gabriel said  to a teacher and come in looking how he did and just keep going back to that house. We teach our students to always come to an adult, so sad he did just that multiple times and was failed üò¢

As for protocol we are taught exactly what she did. We‚Äôve watch countless videos that look almost identical to what she did. Call, report. When no one is helping sometimes you break protocol. The day she said he was crying saying he didn‚Äôt want to go home, I know for a fact I would call the police and keep that child in my classroom as long as needed. That‚Äôs of course no where in the ‚Äúprotocol‚Äù but could‚Äôve saved Gabriel‚Äôs life.

I am a teacher and there is NO possible way I would see a child like that more than once and just let him go home NO WAY. I know people say ‚Äúyou don‚Äôt know until you‚Äôre in the situation‚Äù but no, I know.

It would never have gotten to the point where he got shot with a BB gun if I were the teacher but if it had. I am calling the police and this child is not leaving my classroom. Drag me if you have to. I‚Äôm locking us both in there until police come. Something, I know she said she felt stuck but there were other options.

I know you‚Äôve heard it before, but you‚Äôre 19 you‚Äôre life is far from over though I know it feels like it. I‚Äôm 24 and it was very hard for me to leave at first because I felt I was too old, or would never find anyone else. 
You left! That means you‚Äôre strong 
It‚Äôs been a month for me and he contacts me like every weekend which sends me back to day one 
If I ignore or block he threatens to get evicted from the apartment that is still half in my name. 
YOU WILL get through this. I know it. Message me any time.

Hello, I just want to say thank you for sharing that. It‚Äôs so crazy how so much of what I read on here sounds so much like my own experience when at one point it felt like no one else could understand. I‚Äôve been out of my abusive relationship about a month (after leaving and coming back more than once. I‚Äôve had amazing clarity and have felt better in the last month than I had with him for at least a year. 

The issues with sex you spoke of were almost identical to my situation. I haven‚Äôt been with anyone else intimately yet and i must say it does scare me. Like most people I enjoy sex, but he took a lot of that from me. So even when I just start thinking about sex because I‚Äôm in the mood or what not, he pops into my head, and only the negative sex experiences surface. 

I hope you‚Äôve found the same sense of freedom I‚Äôve found recently because it‚Äôs amazing. It‚Äôs honestly like 90% of my major stressors vanished so much so that idea of sex isn‚Äôt a trigger so much anymore which is great when it seemed to be the cause of so many problems with him. 

Best thing would be to take it slow and be very honest with this new person. I‚Äôve decided I don‚Äôt want just casual sex with the next person, I want us to care enough about each other that I can tell them about my trauma and if they choose to leave because of it 
They‚Äôre not the ones 

I am sooooo sorry that was so long, I just felt your post so much and wanted to let you know you‚Äôre really not alone. Message me any time

Thank you so much! I‚Äôm so happy you got out too. I‚Äôd left before and ended up just coming back. This time felt so liberating because I was and still am 100% certain I‚Äôm never going back to that man and it feels soooo gooood

I was in an abusive relationship and it‚Äôs some really scary shit but best thing is to get some kind of protection and that‚Äôs what police and lawyers are for (hopefully) I know she‚Äôs scared but it‚Äôll be just as bad if she stays.
Lol exactly!
So so so CUTE I never have the patience for sweaters üò≠

I‚Äôve been out of the apartment we shared a little over a month and it‚Äôs really been sooo great. I have so much more peace of mind tho he still scares me. 

My last straw was when I called his family for help as he had been yelling at me and forbidding me to leave the apartment for hours. They came over. He was literally holding me down and not letting me go IN FRONT OF THEM. They tried to convince him to leave. He wouldn‚Äôt. Annnnd. They just left me there. And whole time were saying things like ‚Äúwhat have you let this girl do to your mind?‚Äù Like I was reason he was crazy and abusive. I convinced him to stay at his moms for the night by saying ‚Äúyes, we could work it out I just need a break.‚Äù And the moment he left. I packed my shit and got out.
That is so scary sorry you and her are going through this. Is her family aware?

I‚Äôm only on week two and it still fucking sucks but I will say I‚Äôm much better than day one. And 100% better than when I was in that relationship. I wish you the very best because I really feel you.
Yeah Ive felt that way too. Honestly I felt all kind of ways just in months
Yup, same. I‚Äôm out and I yet I still defend him. However, I‚Äôve come to think that I defend him to make ME not look so bad for having dealt with what I dealt with for so long.
I made the same decision a little bit ago. Definitely for the best.

I went through same thing! I finally got out almost 2 weeks ago. It‚Äôs hard since we shared an apartment and he refuses to let me out the lease. Do you have any money? Could possibly do a cheap Airbnb for a while. No friends who could help??
Thank you.
Thank you. I will continue to think on it.
Thank you for your comment. It helps so much. I‚Äôm glad you got to start healing. It‚Äôs all so scary.
Thank you. It is all just so much because I don‚Äôt want to put that on this persons record but if I‚Äôm left with no choice I will. Their own decisions led them here.

I relate to this sooo much. I just recently got out and the light at the end of the tunnel seems far. However, I feel this sense of relief that I‚Äôm at least somewhat out of his control. Remember how strong you are just for walking away! 
They‚Äôre so good at making you think it‚Äôs all your fault and at least for me that made me stay when I shouldn‚Äôt have. At least now remember your freedom that YOU got back ‚ù§Ô∏è

In a very similar boat but at the end of the day for me personally I just remember this feeling is far better than the constant anxiety and feeling of entrapment. We‚Äôll both get through it, wish you the best ‚ù§Ô∏è
Looks very familiar. Specially the fist through window part ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è.

In the video I watched luckily the girl was very close to my size so I just followed her. I did take measurements then before closing the shorts up around the legs I had to try them on and add a few rows because they didn‚Äôt reach around.

Thank you! I‚Äôve been crocheting about a year and a half and mainly make blankets and Afghans (could be why the stitching looks neat) 
I‚Äôve tried making tops before but was never very proud of them. This is the first piece I felt came out how I wanted it. I had to add a belt tie thing on top because they we little loose toward the back but after that they fit like a glove :) 
Thanks so much again!

Thank you guys for all the love on these :) 
Feel free to ask for a pair ‚ù§Ô∏è
Thank you. They‚Äôre my first piece I‚Äôm like really proud of. I watched a YouTube video from @brunaticality.

Thank you! üòä
No I didn‚Äôt line them. I just did really close double crochet the entire way through and it worked out!
Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è
THIS. My ex would do SAME EXACT thing.
Thank you!
It does help to know I‚Äôm not alone, though I wouldn‚Äôt wish this on anyone. Thank you so much ‚ù§Ô∏è
Thank you üòä

His mom is making it out that I‚Äôm the crazy one. She‚Äôs in denial of what he‚Äôs truly like when he gets in a mood. She doesn‚Äôt know what he‚Äôs capable of. I‚Äôm a teacher. I can‚Äôt have him popping up at my job.
In same boat, constantly in fear of this being the rest of my life.
Omg same. I always almost start thinking, ‚Äúmaybe my ex wasn‚Äôt that toxic‚Äù but gotta remember, he was. And agreed, thank God I didn‚Äôt have kids with him!

Here if need someone to talk to! 
Definitely also, in immense pain.
Agreed. Alternative is just as scary for me though. If either way in the end we still aren‚Äôt together. Here if need someone to talk to üòä
I completely feel you. Wish I could say I‚Äôm on the other side of this. However, I‚Äôm in your boat üò≠

Omg! I‚Äôm not alone. I‚Äôm going through a rough break up and the feeling in my stomach wakes me up at night. I haven‚Äôt eaten much in 4 days because it‚Äôs like I‚Äôm hungry but can‚Äôt stomach food. I don‚Äôt remember this feeling in childhood, think it started around 18. Now every time I‚Äôm very stressed/upset I get the feeling.

I‚Äôm 23 and I have the fear of being alone as well. I find myself contemplating going back to my ex constantly. But I wasn‚Äôt happy, was quite miserable, quite often actually. Sooo I rather be lonely + we‚Äôre young better now than later!!
Wow needed that reminder

Yeah, she had issues
I‚Äôm sure you feel some kind of relief that you‚Äôre out free of her now. That part should feel good.
You go girl!

I know the comments seem harsh but they‚Äôre right. It won‚Äôt get better. It‚Äôll get worse. Better to leave now than later. I was in similar place and it is still hard for me to admit this was abuse but it is.
If he refuses to break the lease I have to get a restraining order for the apartment to let me out the lease and I don‚Äôt want all these problems
Thank you, right now, I‚Äôm still an emotional mess.

I can message your privately but yeah leaving is ONLY option right now. Just gotta figure out how. You‚Äôre only 17 honeyyyyy. Alternative would be staying, suffering and using all the time you could be healing. I‚Äôm only two days out of an abusive relationship and I will tell you. It hurts like crazy. Isn‚Äôt a moment I don‚Äôt think about it. Can‚Äôt eat, can‚Äôt sleep. It‚Äôs better that alternative though. We will look back and think wow great thing I got out of that.
I‚Äôm stuck on how to get over my current situation as well.
Woah. Did I type this?
Hm it won‚Äôt let me private message you on my end.

This helps me a lot as well. I‚Äôm two days out of a relationship and it‚Äôs quite torturous. Cannot eat, cannot sleep, it was a very unhealthy relationship for a long time so I had to leave. I just would like to feel ok again.

Thank you. Everything you said was my exact case. I can‚Äôt help but see the good and make excuses for him like how he‚Äôs been through a lot in life and needs help but I know that doesn‚Äôt give him the right to treat me how he did. I‚Äôm still defending him to my family and friends. I threatened to end things like every week, go stay somewhere else then comeback. This time, I was serious. When he saw all my stuff gone he flipped not on me but in general. I‚Äôm still in a lease that I‚Äôm trying to get out of (he wont agree to break lease) because he has damaged the apartment before and I don‚Äôt want that on me or my credit. I just really want to stop feeling so bad.
It‚Äôs nice to see proof it does get better.
I feel some relief but I still love him and still kind of afraid of him. But it‚Äôs only been two days.
Would you be willing to talk privately? I‚Äôm going through similar situation.
Yes, you definitely have to leave. You just have to find a safe way to do so. I got out of an emotionally abusive relationship. It‚Äôs only day two, it feels awful but I know was right decision.
I was in basically same situation. I‚Äôm finally out and yet I still feel so awful. I feel bad because he can‚Äôt handle his emotions. I know that‚Äôs not my problem but still.
Sorry, your birthday went that way. Are you considering ending the relationship?

I can relate. It‚Äôs very hard for me to admit I was in an emotionally abusive relationship because for so long I just blamed it on his childhood and things he‚Äôs gone through. I was willing to stay with him while he got help but I couldn‚Äôt anymore. Left him yesterday, got all my things today. It was bad, cops got called because his music but he flipped out yelling thinking I called them or something. It was and still is the hardest thing I‚Äôve ever had to do but even with the constant pain I feel. I feel relief that I don‚Äôt have to deal with so much anymore.

I had to leave an abusive relationship as well. Like just tonight luckily I had my sister but my plan was also air bnb. I know it may not be a good permanent place but would work for tonight if you just let them know what‚Äôs happening and you have a baby.

I just got out of an abusive relationship as well. Like very recent. Like finally over today recent. And my emotions are all over the place. From numb to crying profusely. However I also feel great relief. I am glad you got out of that relationship and felt relief as well.
Yeahhh my ex had an explosive break up with his ex. Always blamed her. I should‚Äôve know.
Woah. Sorry you‚Äôre going through this. I just got out of an emotionally abusive relationship.
In the same boat my friend üö£‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

I left Friday and today was by far worse day of my life. Police were called it was bad. He has mental issues that he won‚Äôt get help for so I had to go but I‚Äôm in this weird place where I still don‚Äôt want people to think he‚Äôs a bad person. All I can say is leave. I‚Äôm battling with breaking a lease and afraid it will ruin my credit but I also feel relief. I was always so afraid to leave because of what he might do and today I saw it. Yelling, throwing things, yelling at the police. It was enough to know I made the right decision.

Yeah I knew it wouldn‚Äôt. Just wishful thinking I guess. I‚Äôve heard the stories and thought same thing and now here I am. I‚Äôm currently at my sister‚Äôs, very tight on money atm & kinda feel ashamed to ask anyone to stay with them. My plan is Airbnb for $560 a month, less than my half for rent. That will be put in action Wednesday. So I‚Äôll manage for 3 days.
Definitely!
I‚Äôd want to know why too, so I don‚Äôt blame you. It‚Äôs human annnd sometimes being human sucks.
Sorry to hear that, try not to think about the why too much, the answer most likely won‚Äôt make it any easier.

I‚Äôm in the opposite situation. My boyfriend has BPD, we also argue a lot lately, he‚Äôs threatened to kill himself before when I said I couldn‚Äôt take it anymore. It just becomes too much to watch someone you love not love themselves (my situation, idk about yours). Currently he is going to try Dialectical Behavior Therapy and Cognitive Behavior Therapy. That‚Äôs all I ever wanted, I can help him through it if I SEE the effort. He was in denial for the longest. So I‚Äôd say, focus on you, whether that‚Äôs therapy, medicine, yoga idk but showing him effort, giving him hope. If the break up happens STILL focus on you because he‚Äôll put the blame on himself if you threaten to do anything (my situation as well).
Thank you!
Thank you very much ‚ù§Ô∏è

lol I was too dumb to take that out when they gave it to me. She was like oh allergies? I‚Äôm like nope tears. I said I‚Äôd rather not talk bout it. She gave me a hug & that was that. 
I‚Äôm just waiting for that time heals all thing. Typing this while he sits in the living room. üò≠

I‚Äôm with you! I‚Äôm currently going through a break up and still living with him as well. I ended things but it was inevitable, we weren‚Äôt working for so long tho I wanted us to so bad. I just wanna go back on what I said but I‚Äôve done that before and history just repeated itself. Not to be dramatic but this shit feels like DEATH. I got caught crying at work today & just had to play it coo.

Oh. Sorry for the lack of advise but hopefully it helps that someone feels your pain. I‚Äôm trying to just keep myself busy. Only plan I have rn.
